CustomField.description: Maximum parallel workers for bulk execution operations. Balances throughput vs database contention. System uses min(limit, available slots, records). Higher = faster but more row-locking risk.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Controls bulk execution parallelism. Higher = faster but may cause row locks. Lower = safer but slower. Recommended: 5-15. Default: 5.
CustomField.label: Bulk Concurrency Limit
